item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Quick Start The simplest way to install Argus is to use Helm. First, you will need to add the LogicMonitor chart repository: $ helm repo add logicmonitor https://logicmonitor.github.com/k8s-helm-charts "logicmonitor" has been added to your repositories Next, install the LogicMonitor Collectorset controller: $ helm upgrade \ --install \ --debug \ --wait \ --tiller-namespace="$NAMESPACE" \ --set accessID="$ACCESS_ID" \ --set accessKey="$ACCESS_KEY" \ --set account="$ACCOUNT" \ --set clusterName="$CLUSTER_NAME" \ --set etcdDiscoveryToken="$ETCD_DISCOVERY_TOKEN" \ --set imageTag="$IMAGE_TAG" \ collectorset-controller logicmonitor/collectorset-controller Note: The Collectorset controller should be installed only once per cluster.
